    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40cf0aeb-8968-4293-2487-9f4ea7d91ca5#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Kelta bronzkancsó Basse-Yutzból.</string>
            <string language="en">Celtic bronze flagon from Basse-Yutz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Keltisches Bronzeflagon von Basse-Yutz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Flagon en bronze celtique de Basse-Yutz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Flagon de bronze celtic de Basse-Yutz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Flagon bronze celtico da Basse-Yutz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κελτικό flagon χαλκού από ψασσε- Yutz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Flagon de bronce céltico de Basse-Yutz</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">fedeles kancsópár, korallberakás és vörös zománc.</string>
            <string language="en">A pair of flagon,coral marquetry and red enamel</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">ötvösség,  Kr.e. 5. század vége,  kelta,  bronzkancsó,  korallberakás,  vörös zománc,  London, British Museum,  </string>
            <string language="en">goldsmith's art, end of 5th century BC, Celtic, bronze flagon, coral marquetry, red enamel, London , British Museum</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Paar flagon, korallenroter Marquetry und rote 
Emaille</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une paire de flagon, de marqueterie de corail et 
d'émail rouge</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um par do flagon, do marquetry coral e do esmalte 
vermelho</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un accoppiamento di flagon, del marquetry di 
corallo e dello smalto rosso</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα ζευγάρι flagon, marquetry κοραλλιών και του 
κόκκινου σμάλτου</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un par de flagon, de marquetry coralino y de 
esmalte rojo</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kunst des Goldschmieds, Ende des 5. Jahrhunderts BC, 
keltisches, Bronzeflagon, korallenroter Marquetry, rote Emaille, 
London, britisches Museum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'art de l'orfèvre, fin de 5ème siècle BC, flagon 
celtique et en bronze, marqueterie de corail, émail rouge, Londres, 
musée britannique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">arte do goldsmith, fim do ö século BC, flagon celtic, 
de bronze, marquetry coral, esmalte vermelho, Londres, museu 
britânico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">arte dell'orafo, conclusione del quinto secolo BC, flagon
celtico e bronze, marquetry di corallo, smalto rosso, Londra, museo 
britannico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τέχνη χρυσοχόου, τέλος του 5$ου αιώνα Π.Χ., κελτικός, 
flagon χαλκού, marquetry κοραλλιών, κόκκινο σμάλτο, 
Λονδίνο, βρετανικό μουσείο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">arte del orfebre, final del 5to siglo A.C., flagon 
céltico, de bronce, marquetry coralino, esmalte rojo, Londres, museo 
británico</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
